cancelableSubTitle: If enabled, this payment stream can be cancelled at a later time.

noPaymentsTitle: This Role has no active payments.
noPaymentsSubTitle: Payment streams for contributor compensation or token vesting can be assigned to Roles. The streams are transferrable, protecting DAO funds in the event a Role is reassigned.

termedRoleConfirmation-3: Active payments will be cancelled. Any unclaimed funds will be refunded.
termedRoleConfirmation-4: New payment streams must be assigned to an active term.
